mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-10, southeast wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Jenny [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various graffitis: one saying someone was here; another with song lyrics, to which another responds in a way revealing Iggy Azalea as the source of the lyric (her song "Leave It"); some math stuff; another encouraging reader; and a political slogan [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Beeshman was here | you should wanna bad bitch like this ‚Üê IGGY, is that you? | You're beautiful! | KANYE 2020
